items.name: Salad
items.description: Fresh mixed greens with assorted vegetables and dressing.

items.name: Soup
items.description: Homemade soup with a variety of seasonal ingredients.

items.name: Bruschetta
items.description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, and olive oil.

items.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
items.description: Mushroom caps filled with a savory mixture of breadcrumbs, cheese, and herbs.

items.name: Caprese Salad
items.description: Fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and balsamic glaze.

items.name: Garlic Bread
items.description: Toasted bread rubbed with garlic and topped with butter and herbs.

items.name: Burger
items.description: Classic beef burger with lettuce, tomato, onion, and cheese.

items.name: Sandwich
items.description: Delicious sandwich with turkey, ham, lettuce, tomato, and mayo.

items.name: Pizza
items.description: Freshly baked pizza with your choice of toppings.

items.name: Fish Tacos
items.description: Grilled fish served in soft tortillas with cabbage slaw and chipotle mayo.

items.name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
items.description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing wrapped in a tortilla.

items.name: Club Sandwich
items.description: Triple-decker sandwich with ham, turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo.

items.name: Steak
items.description: Grilled sirloin steak served with mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

items.name: Pasta
items.description: Spaghetti with homemade marinara sauce and meatballs.

items.name: Grilled Salmon
items.description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection and served with lemon butter sauce.

items.name: Risotto
items.description: Creamy Italian rice dish cooked with mushrooms, Parmesan cheese, and white wine.

items.name: Beef Stir Fry
items.description: Tender beef strips stir-fried with vegetables in a savory sauce.

items.name: Roast Chicken
items.description: Oven-roasted chicken served with roasted potatoes and gravy.

items.name: Soda
items.description: Assorted soft drinks and carbonated beverages.

items.name: Wine
items.description: Selection of red and white wines from local vineyards.

items.name: Beer
items.description: Variety of locally brewed beers on tap.

items.name: Cocktails
items.description: Handcrafted cocktails made with premium spirits and fresh ingredients.

items.name: Smoothies
items.description: Refreshing blended drinks made with fresh fruit and yogurt.

items.name: Iced Tea
items.description: Chilled tea served with lemon and sugar syrup.

items.name: Chocolate Cake
items.description: Rich chocolate cake served with vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.

items.name: Cheesecake
items.description: Creamy cheesecake topped with strawberries and whipped cream.

items.name: Apple Pie
items.description: Homemade apple pie served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

items.name: Fruit Tart
items.description: Buttery pastry crust filled with vanilla custard and topped with assorted fresh fruits.

items.name: Ice Cream Sundae
items.description: Vanilla ice cream topped with chocolate sauce, whipped cream, and a cherry on top.

items.name: Lemon Tart
items.description: Tangy lemon filling in a buttery tart shell, garnished with powdered sugar.

items.name: Panna Cotta
items.description: Italian dessert of sweetened cream thickened with gelatin and served with fruit sauce.
